Description: United Arab Emirates University (UAEU) - the first and foremost comprehensive national university in the United Arab Emirates. F
Full Description:
Welcome to the United Arab Emirates University (UAEU) - the first and foremost comprehensive national university in the United Arab Emirates. Founded in 1976 by the late Sheikh Zayed Bin Sultan Al Nahyan, UAEU aspires to become a comprehensive, research-intensive university and currently enrolls approximately 14,000 Emirati and international students. As the UAE�s flagship university, UAEU offers a full range of accredited, high-quality graduate and undergraduate programs through nine Colleges: Business and Economics; Education; Engineering; Food and Agriculture; Humanities and Social Sciences; IT; Law; Medicine and Health Sciences; and Science. With a distinguished international faculty, state-of-the art new campus, and full range of student support services, UAEU offers a living-learning environment that is unmatched in the UAE.

In its drive to achieve international research stature, UAEU works with its partners in industry to provide research solutions to challenges faced by the nation, the region, and the world. The University has established research centers of strategic importance to the country and the region which are advancing knowledge in critical areas ranging from water resources to cancer treatments. UAEU is currently ranked #1 in the UAE, #5 in the Arab World and #390 worldwide.

UAEU�s academic programs have been developed in partnership with employers, so our graduates are in high demand.  UAEU alumni hold key positions in industry, commerce, and government throughout the region. Our continuing investments in facilities, services, and staff ensure that UAEU will continue to serve as a model of innovation and excellence.

Description: Ajman University is a private institution of higher education in the United Arab Emirates and the Gulf region.
Full Description:
Founded in 1988 as the first private institution of higher education in the United Arab Emirates and the Gulf region, Ajman University (AU) is now being recognized as an emerging leader on the global academic map.

The 2020 QS World University Rankings lists AU in the top 800 universities globally and among the top 10 worldwide for international students and faculty! The �Top 50 Under 50� QS Rankings names AU as one of the top 150 young universities in the world. Even our distinct location in the Dubai/Sharjah/Ajman corridor is ranked by QS as the 61st best student destination on the planet. Recently, Ajman University earned Five QS Stars in three ratings categories -- Social Responsibility, Inclusiveness and Learning Environment. We also garnered Four QS Stars for both Teaching and Internationalization.

Esol Education specializes in the establishment and management of high quality international schools around the Middle East .
Full Description:
Founded in 1976, Esol Education specializes in the establishment and management of high quality international schools around the Middle East and Mediterranean. Headquartered in Dubai, UAE, with branch offices in Hong Kong, Cairo and Nicosia, Esol Education currently serves over 10,000 students, operating a total of nine international schools in Dubai, Abu Dhabi, Cairo, Nicosia, and Aley.

Each of the Esol Education schools follows an American or British curriculum and is accredited by the Middle States Association of Colleges and Schools (MSA) and/or the Council of International Schools (CIS). Seven Esol schools currently offer the International Baccalaureate (IB) Diploma Programme with some offering the International Baccalaureate Primary Years Program (IBPYP).

Esol Education schools enjoy the benefits of experienced leadership and management, excellent facilities, and caring and dedicated teachers. Since its inception, Esol�s focus has always been the attainment of the highest standards of educational excellence.

Description: GMAT, SAT, ACT, GRE, UCAT Test Prep Training Center in Dubai & Abu Dhabi
Full Description:
GMAT, SAT, ACT, GRE, UCAT Test Prep Training Center in Dubai & Abu Dhabi
One Attempt FZ LLC is the exclusive franchisee of Jamboree Education in Dubai and Abu Dhabi, a proven and trusted name in the international test preparations for GMAT, SAT, ACT, GRE, UCAT training and admissions consulting. At One Attempt, we help you succeed in planning and pursuing your dream career by providing appropriate career advice, the best test preparation techniques, and a proven track-record of application support.

In addition, One Attempt is a Pearson VUE Authorized Test Centre, offering official testing services for UCAT and various other exams. One Attempt methodology defines a researched, comprehensive syllabus band for each of these exams, ensuring the best preparation for each specific test. This focused approach has led to One Attempt students achieving some of the highest scores in the GMAT, GRE, SAT, ACT, and UCAT across the UAE.

Our Admissions Consulting Cell, since its inception, has demonstrated consistently exceptional results. We have, with a high degree of success, helped place our students at leading universities and business schools across the globe, including Harvard, Wharton, Stanford, MIT, London Business School, Oxford, Cambridge, Columbia, Yale, Cornell, IIMs, and INSEAD.

Description: Gulf Medical University is focuses in the three core areas of Medical Education, Healthcare and Research.
Full Description:
Gulf Medical University (GMU), Ajman, is one of the first private medical universities in the Middle East region. It is owned and run by Thumbay Group, a diversified international business conglomerate headquartered at DIFC � Dubai. Mr. Thumbay Moideen, Founder President of Thumbay Group had established the Gulf Medical College (GMC) in 1998, as an institution offering undergraduate programs in Medicine, Physiotherapy, Dentistry and Pharmacy. The institution became a full-fledged medical university � the Gulf Medical University in 2008 following a Decree by H.E. Sheikh Nahyan Bin Mubarak Al Nahyan, the Minister of Higher Education and Scientific Research, UAE.

The Ministry of Higher Education & Scientific Research has recognized GMU as a center of excellence and has permitted the University to offer a range of courses including undergraduate studies in medicine, biomedical sciences, dentistry, pharmacy, physiotherapy and different courses in health sciences. Apart from being the first medical institution in the region which offers admissions to both boys and girls of all nationalities, the Gulf Medical University has also earned the reputation of providing programs that had been introduced in the region for the first time. GMU is first in the region to launch unique programs like Masters in Human Reproductive Biology, Bachelor of Biomedical Sciences and Masters in Physical Therapy.

The focus of the Gulf Medical University is in the three core areas of Medical Education, Healthcare and Research. The university has infrastructure and facilities which are at par with international standards. Apart from the academic programs, Gulf Medical University is at the forefront of Continuing Medical Education and Continuing Professional Development Programs. The university has also been organizing international and regional conferences and symposia.
